backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing schools and daily reports with admin authorization, data storage, and role-gated CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related frontend files, components, and test IDs for admin school editing and React Query updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files for quick reference during build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router handling authentication, role-based page selection, and admin view switching.
frontend/src/components/admin/ActiveScho: Admin table listing active schools with search, error/loading states, and edit dialog integration.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSumma: Displays two summary cards showing active school count and today's report submissions using query hooks and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsS: Generates completion percentages and 7‑day trend data from today's reports and renders line and pie charts, with skeletons during loading.
frontend/src/components/admin/EditSchool: Dialog form for editing a school's details, prefilled from a summary object and saved via a mutation hook with validation and toasts.
frontend/src/components/admin/KepsekProf: Form for principals to create or update their school profile, saving via a mutation hook with simple validation and feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/Monitoring: Displays ranked daily reports in a sortable table with score badges and a detail view, loading skeletons, and report selection handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReportDeta: Dialog showing a detailed breakdown of a principal's daily report, including photo, category scores, and formatted date.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component with logo, title, optional actions, and logout functionality clearing React Query cache.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/Attendanc: Handles image selection, validation, preview, and upload‑progress tracking for attendance photos, emitting an ExternalBlob to the parent.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/DailyRepo: Form component for creating or editing a daily report, handling score calculation, photo upload, and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/ProfileSe: Dialog form for entering and saving school profile details using a saveSchool mutation.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/TodaySubm: Displays today's submitted daily report with score breakdown, attendance photo, and an edit button.
frontend/src/components/StatusPills.tsx: Provides badge components for scoring, submission status, and category score display with color logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for roles, school data, and daily reports, using the actor to fetch and mutate backend state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme configuration defining light and dark color variables and utility layers.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Displays an access-denied message with a logout button that clears identity and cached queries.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with summary cards, analytics, active schools, and monitoring table.
frontend/src/pages/AdminKepsekManagement: Provides admin tools to register and manage principal profiles, including a form toggle.
frontend/src/pages/KepsekDashboardPage.t: Shows principal profile, today's report status, and a form for submitting daily reports if needed.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen allowing users to authenticate via Internet Identity with a styled UI card.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, containers, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s versioned state for a web app tracking daily Kepsek performance, including architecture notes, known issues, and a list of implemented features. Contains role-based access, daily form requirements, admin dashboards, analytics, and UI styling features.
